mapper.select: SELECT AA.BSNS_CODE /* 업체_코드 */ ,AA.BOARD_SN /* 게시판_일련번호*/ ,AA.BOARD_GBN_CD /* 게시판_구분_코드 */ ,(SELECT PSCC.DETAIL_CODE_NM FROM PKHL_SYS_CMMN_CODE PSCC WHERE 1=1 AND PSCC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PSCC.BSNS_CODE = AA.BSNS_CODE AND PSCC.CMMN_CODE = AA.BOARD_GBN_CD ) AS BOARD_GBN_CD_NM /* 게시판_구분_코드_명 */ ,AA.SUBJECT /* 제목 */ ,AA.CONTENT /* 내용 */ ,AA.HIT_COUNT /* 조회 수 */ FROM BSNS_BOARD AA WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_SN = #{boardSn}
mapper.update: UPDATE BSNS_BOARD SET USE_YN = 'N' ,MOD_DT = now() ,MOD_ID = 'aa' WHERE 1=1 AND BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND BOARD_SN = #{boardSn}
